doc.headline: BLM shooting Mac 10 in victory celebration Chicago protest

A black racism problem, stoking arson and victimhood and pointing to whitey as to who provoked it. These are bad actor's performance art. This is one of George Soros finest handiwork if he could destabilize America as he has other countries.

A SAW MY MOMMA CRYYYY....."

All the firearms the *anti hate* lad has are illegal in Illinois.

doc.post:
http://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2015/jan/14/george-soros-funds-ferguson-protests-hopes-to-spur/
Holy cow! Worse than I thought.
From the link: "In all, Mr. Soros gave at least $33 million in one year to support already-established groups that emboldened the grass-roots, on-the-ground activists in Ferguson, according to the most recent tax filings of his nonprofit Open Society Foundations.
The financial tether from Mr. Soros to the activist groups gave rise to a combustible protest movement that transformed a one-day criminal event in Missouri into a 24-hour-a-day national cause celebre."
Combustible. Effective writing.
Steve, I'll pass the joint to 'ya.

I'll take the joint, pass it to me.
